columns.name: file_system_id
columns.description: The system-generated, unique 17-digit ID of the file system.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the EFS file system.

columns.name: file_system_type
columns.description: The type of Amazon FSx file system, which can be LUSTRE, WINDOWS, or ONTAP.

columns.name: lifecycle
columns.description: The lifecycle status of the file system, following are the possible values AVAILABLE, CREATING, DELETING, FAILED, MISCONFIGURED, UPDATING.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time that the file system was created.

columns.name: dns_name
columns.description: The DNS name for the file system.

columns.name: file_system_type_version
columns.description: The version of your Amazon FSx for Lustre file system, either 2.10 or 2.12.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The ID of the Key Management Service (KMS) key used to encrypt the file system's.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The AWS account that created the file system.

columns.name: storage_capacity
columns.description: The storage capacity of the file system in gibibytes (GiB).

columns.name: storage_type
columns.description: The storage type of the file system.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: The ID of the primary VPC for the file system.

columns.name: administrative_actions
columns.description: A list of administrative actions for the file system that are in process or waiting to be processed.

columns.name: failure_details
columns.description: A structure providing details of any failures that occur when creating the file system has failed.

columns.name: lustre_configuration
columns.description: The configuration for the Amazon FSx for Lustre file system.

columns.name: network_interface_ids
columns.description: The IDs of the elastic network interface from which a specific file system is accessible.

columns.name: ontap_configuration
columns.description: The configuration for this FSx for NetApp ONTAP file system.

columns.name: open_zfs_configuration
columns.description: The configuration for this FSx for NetApp ONTAP file system.

columns.name: subnet_ids
columns.description: Specifies the IDs of the subnets that the file system is accessible from.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with Filesystem.

columns.name: windows_configuration
columns.description: The configuration for this Microsoft Windows file system.
